task.description: Steps to restore Jekyll if the Eleventy migration fails.

step.action: Keep migration on separate branch until fully tested
step.detail: Do not merge to master until all tests pass

step.action: Do not delete Gemfile/Gemfile.lock until deployment verified
step.detail: Keep Ruby files until live site is confirmed working

step.action: Restore Jekyll version if issues arise
step.detail: Switch back to master branch with working Jekyll setup
GitHub Pages can be reconfigured to use Jekyll instead of Actions
